name: Ghost Jam
description:
First Game Project in Class!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - movemnet

Spacebar - jump (hold for longer jumps)

E - attack (Hold for alt. attack)

R - reset level

Credits: 

Made By:  Bailey F,  Oliver B, and Ryan M

Tilesets + Main Menu Background 

https://penusbmic.itch.io/free-dungeon-ruins-tileset 

https://penusbmic.itch.io/the-dead-town-tileset 

https://aethrall.itch.io/demon-woods-parallax-background
